inventec-bbu/AU-2/AU-2.py: out = ssh_exec("logger 'AU-2 TEST' && grep 'AU-2 TEST' /var/log/messages | wc -l\n")
inventec-bbu/AU-3/AU-3.py: cmd = "logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%d.*%H'` /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname -s`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/messages | wc -l\n"
inventec-bbu/AC-4/AC-4.py: channel.send("echo '"+password+"' | sudo -S timeout 5 tcpdump -c 50 -i "+interface+" -nn \"arp and not net "+network+"\" 2> /dev/null | wc -l\n")

inventec-bbu/MA-4/MA-4.py: cmd = "echo '"+password+"' | sudo -S grep -i sshd.*accept /var/log/secure | wc -l && sudo grep -i sshd.*open /var/log/secure | wc -l && sudo grep -i sshd.*close /var/log/secure | wc -l"

inventec-bbu/AC-17/AC-17.py: out = ssh_exec("echo '"+password+"' | sudo -S grep sshd /var/log/secure | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /root/.bash_history | wc -l\n")
verify_result["AC-17_TestScript"] = "echo '+password+' | sudo -S grep sshd /var/log/secure | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /root/.bash_history | wc -l"
inventec-bbu/SI-2/SI-2.py: cmm_update_record = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'upgrade'  /var/log/dpkg.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'updated'  /var/log/yum.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"
inventec-bbu/AU-11/AU-11.py: out = ssh_exec("date -d \"`head -1 /var/log/\`ls /var/log/ | grep -m 1 -E '^messages-'\` | awk '{print $2,$1}'``ls /var/log/ | grep -m 1 -E '^messages-' | grep -oP '20\d\d'`\" '+%s;%Y-%m-%d' && date '+%s;%Y-%m-%d'")
